description: Seasoned ground beef tucked into crispy corn shells with lettuce and cheddar, served alongside Mexican rice.

imagePrompt.base: Hyper-realistic close-up of Classic Beef Tacos plated elegantly on a white plate. Pure white studio background, natural window lighting, shallow depth of field. Showcase vibrant colors, gentle steam, and fresh garnish that highlights texture.
imagePrompt.enhanced: Hyper-realistic close-up: Three crispy corn tacos brimming with richly seasoned ground beef, vibrant shredded lettuce, and melted golden cheddar. Elegantly arranged on a pristine white plate, a whisper of steam rising. Bathed in soft, natural window light from the side, creating inviting shadows and highlighting every texture. Ultra shallow depth of field.
